projects.name: Collision Detection
projects.summary:
A simple 2D collision detection project written in JAVA using AABB(axis-aligned bounding boxes) and Separating Axis Theorem (SAT) algorithms
AABB groups robots supporting abstraction of different structures such as `Arm on an Elevator`, and allowing custom translation and rotation to specific stucture

projects.name: Animation on the proof of dot product
projects.summary:
Viedeo introduces the proof of dot product formula using law of cosines that took me several hours to animate using Manim and Python.
Link to the video: https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV11aW2znEdQ

highlights: a graph based state machine that abstracts robot behaviors into states(angle and height of our arm on Elevator mechanism) as node and allowable transitions as edges

awards.summary: Achieved score of 68/75 in the 2024 CCC Junior Division, and 27/75 in the 2025 CCC Senior Division.
